evidence.claim: TurboML utilizes AWS services for scalable machine learning applications.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring patient data security.
TurboML integrates with EHR systems using FHIR for health data interoperability.
They utilize Apache Kafka for real-time data streaming in their analytics platform.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of focus on X12 transactions or clearinghouse functions found.
